pr_title: MULE-18493: HTTP Connector leaking sockets in state CLOSE_WAIT when client uses HTTP/1.0

timeline.message:
MULE-18493: HTTP Connector leaking sockets in state CLOSE_WAIT when client uses HTTP/1.0

The method "doComplete" was being called twice (and triggered a NPE) because of a workaround in the close method in the CompletionHandler needed for most HTTP 1.0 cases that do use OutputHandlers. Added a flag to prevent it from being called twice.

MULE-18493: HTTP Connector leaking sockets in state CLOSE_WAIT when client uses HTTP/1.0

Created a test to reproduce the issue and verified that the solution made the test pass. It is a flow with a listener and a soap call.
